org.apache.taverna.server.master.factories

Interface ConfigurableRunFactory

  • All Superinterfaces:
    RunFactory
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractRemoteRunFactory, ForkRunFactory, IdAwareForkRunFactory, RunFactoryConfiguration

    public interface ConfigurableRunFactory
extends RunFactory
    Interface to run factories for the purpose of configuration.
    Author:
    Donal Fellows
